question: Harihar Kshetra Sonepur Mela has started recently in which state?
explanation: Sonepur Cattle Fair is held on Kartik Poornima in the month of November- December in Sonepur, Bihar, on the confluence of river Ganges. It is also known as Harihar Kshetra Mela and it attracts visitors from all over Asia. Till date, it is the biggest cattle fair of Asia and stretches on from fifteen days to one month. Elephants have been one of the major attractions at the Sonepur Mela. Many tourists from across the world come here to see them.
